description: Amount of tokens transferred (ERC20) / id of the token transferred (ERC721). Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64
name: value

description: The address of an account/contract that is approved to make the transfer (ERC1155)
name: operator

description: ids of the token transferred (ERC1155). Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64.
name: token_ids

description: Amounts of token transferred (ERC1155).  Use safe_cast for casting to NUMERIC or FLOAT64
name: token_values

description: Log index in the transaction receipt
name: log_index

description: Timestamp of the block where this transfer was in
name: block_timestamp

description: Block number where this transfer was in
name: block_number

description: Hash of the block where this transfer was in
name: block_hash
